TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Angola, title = Angola, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angola} }

S.FORM: Angola(Ankola, 安哥拉) I tini i 12 30 S, 18 30 E, i katimol no Afilika ko Ankola. Polong no sekalay i 1,246,700 km2, saka 23 ko tata'ang i hekal. O sekalay no sera i, 1,246,700 km2. Polong i 20,172,332 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera, o malo kakaomahen a sera 47.30%, malo no kilakilangan a sera 46.80%, romasato 5.90%. siyoto O Luanta ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i, saka 11 folad, saka 11 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci José Eduardo dos Santos , patirengan a romi'ad i 1979 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 10 a romi'ad. Talihafan CIA 外交部

Angola(Ankola, 安哥拉) I tini i 12 30 S, 18 30 E, i katimol no Afilika ko Ankola. Polong no sekalay i 1,246,700 km2, saka 23 ko tata'ang i hekal. O sekalay no sera i, 1,246,700 km2. Polong i 20,172,332 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera, o malo kakaomahen a sera 47.30%, malo no kilakilangan a sera 46.80%, romasato 5.90%. siyoto O Loanta ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i, saka 11 folad, saka 11 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci José Edoardo dos Santos , patirengan a romi'ad i 1979 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 10 a romi'ad. Talihafan CIA 外交部
